name: Username Logger
description: Collects usernames from nearby players and buddies, with integrated leak checking functionality
author: glvckoma

commands.name: leakcheck
commands.description: Run a leak check on collected usernames. Usage: !leakcheck [all|number]

commands.name: setapikey
commands.description: Sets the LeakCheck API key. Usage: !setapikey YOUR_API_KEY

commands.name: testapikey
commands.description: Tests if the current LeakCheck API key is valid.

commands.name: setindex
commands.description: Sets the leak check index to a specific position. Usage: !setindex 1234

commands.name: trimprocessed
commands.description: Remove processed usernames from the collected list and reset index.
